Module Animation

Module Summary
Animation The animation module will receive parameters from the user interface and use them to construct the desired visualization. This module will, among other things, create an internal audioNode and use it to drive a collection of geometric objects. The particularities of these geometric objects, and of the ways in which the audioNode will drive them, will depend on the provided parameter values.
 

Animation Objects Summary
Spheres or Cubes The AudioSight plugin will generate spheres or cubes based user's selection. The size and color of the geometric objects are derien by a specific band/frenquency calculated by FFT algothrim. The MEL procedure used for generating spheres or cubes: grapes(string $filename, int $bands, int $shape, float $left[], float $right[], int $interpolation, int $color)
Speakers The AudioSight plugin will generate three speakers. The audio file will be divided into three band through FFT algothrim: bass, mid, treble. Each speaker is driven by each band. The MEL procedure used for generating spheres or cubes: speakerScene(string $filename, int $bass, int $mid, int $treble, float $left[], float $right[], int $interpolation, int $color)
 

Animation Procedures Summary
void grapes(string $filename, int $bands, int $shape, float $left[], float $right[], int $interpolation, int $color)
Creates spheres and cubes animation
void speakerScene(string $filename, int $bass, int $mid, int $treble, float $left[], float $right[], int $interpolation, int $color)
Create speakers animation
